item.title: CVE-2024-24928|2024-02-12T06:00:43.270Z -- Arunas Liuiza -- Content Cards
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Arunas Liuiza Content Cards allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Content Cards: from n/a through 0.9.7.
